name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pronto Xi POS Customer Facing Screen

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move customer facing screen to next monitor and full screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pronto Xi POS Customer Facing Screen
 
Use the extension to transfer an ongoing POS session between the operator and customer facing screen, without losing any information.
 
Display shopping items, running totals and applicable discounts for each item as they get scanned. Moreover, you can advertise offers and new products via HTML-based content to maximize opportunities with a captive audience.
 
About Pronto POS
 
A powerful, secure and flexible point-of-sale system that allows your staff to concentrate on customersâ€™ needs rather than the mechanics of transaction processing. A real-time integration with Pronto Xi ERP delivers an optimum work environment for all personnel, from POS operators to senior management.
